text.name: info3
text.text: CPU: MIPS R3000A compatible 32-bit RISC CPU

text.name: info4
text.text: Memory: 2 MB RAM, 1 MB video RAM

text.name: info9
text.text: The PlayStation was the first of the PS lineup of home video game

text.name: info10
text.text: consoles. It primarily competed with the Nintendo 64 and the Sega

text.name: info11
text.text: Saturn as part of the fifth generation of video game consoles.
